consentBanner.title: We use cookies
consentBanner.content: We use cookies and local storage to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By using our website, you agree to our use of cookies and local storage. Declining consent may result in suboptimal website performance.

search.info: Navigate using ↑ and ↓ or ↹. Select using ↵.

title.caption: Title
title.hint: What's your programming question? Be specific.

tags.title: Tags
tags.caption: Tags
tags.hint: Add up to 5 tags to describe what your question is about.

simp.title: Enable Simp
simp.hint: Users, as well as our in-house AI chatbot will be able to reply to your question to help provide you with the best help possible.

users.title: Only Users
users.hint: Only Users will be able to upload answers to your question.

validate.title: Check your Question
validate.caption: Validate
validate.hint: Verify that you have created your question correctly.

checks.title: A valid title
checks.description: A detailed description of at least 20 words
